lead_paragraph: India had refused visas to members of an American commission that examines violations of religious freedom.

headline.print_headline: Asia; India: U.S. Voices Dismay Over Denial of Visas to Religious Freedom Group
headline.main: India: U.S. Voices Dismay Over Denial of Visas to Religious Freedom Group

snippet: India had refused visas to members of an American commission that examines violations of religious freedom.
abstract: State Dept decries India's decision to deny visa requests by members of commission appointed by United States government to examine religious freedom violations worldwide.
